response.overview: A twice-divorced mother of three who sees an injustice, takes on the bad guy and wins -- with a little help from her push-up bra. Erin goes to work for an attorney and comes across medical records describing illnesses clustered in one nearby town. She starts investigating and soon exposes a monumental cover-up.
response.tagline: She brought a small town to its feet and a huge company to its knees.
response.title: Erin Brockovich

results.name: Erin Brockovich (2000) Official Trailer - Steven Soderbergh, Julia Roberts
Julia Roberts Wins Best Actress | 73rd Oscars (2001)
